About Me

Juan Camilo Henao Londono

I am a Colombian guy that really likes to learn, travel and make sports. I made my B. Sc. and my M. Sc. in the National University of Colombia in Manizales. During my master I live around one year in Montreal. I worked as lecturer in the National University of Colombia in Manizales and the Autonomous University of Manizales. Currently, I am a Ph. D. student at the University of Duisburg-Essen in Germany. In this website I want to show you a little of my professional life and share some experiences and knowdlege.
